description: Client: The class Spryker\Client\ZedRequest\Client\ZedClient does not implement an interface ZedClientInterface which violates rule: "Must implement an interface with same name and suffix 'Interface'."
Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'addErrorMessage' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'addSuccessMessage' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
Access: Method Spryker\Shared\ZedRequest\Client\AbstractHttpClient::getTransferFromResponse() accesses Spryker\Client\ZedRequest\Client\Response which violates rule "No call from Shared to Client"
Access: Method Spryker\Shared\ZedRequest\Client\AbstractHttpClient::getRequest() accesses Spryker\Client\ZedRequest\Client\Request which violates rule "No call from Shared to Client"

Client: The class Spryker\Shared\ZedRequest\Client\LoggableZedClient does not implement an interface LoggableZedClientInterface which violates rule: "Must implement an interface with same name and suffix 'Interface'."
